title: Phone not received gone for repair nd date extending date by date without proper information
content:
I had given my phone to repair first it was going to come on the 9th then 13 then 14 and 18 .. how much you guys wanna harass the customer through to this covid 19. You guys are not even giving proper information bout the delay. 

Pathetic service I have ever seen and experienced. It's like date by date but no update on the phone.. worst experience ever.
